revised_title: John Beresford Leathes: A Pioneering Figure in Medical Research and Education
tldr: John Beresford Leathes was a prominent figure in medical research and education, specializing in physiology and biochemical research. He made significant contributions to the understanding of metabolism, fats, and the liver's role in metabolism. Leathes was also a dedicated teacher and played a crucial role in breaking down barriers between preclinical and clinical studies, influencing medical education throughout his career.
